name: Puneet
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: That summer of 2022, I first saw you, then I met you, I liked you, I love you and I am keeping you😍🤗. Kaisa bhi din ho tumhe yaad kiye bina nhi jata. And mujhe nhi pata mai kya kr skta tumhare liye, but I will stand by your side in every situation be it worst or happiest And mene ek jagah padha tha vo tumhare liye fit hai: Jdo puri duniya so jandi ae, mein udo v teri photo takda han, teri puja kriye dil de mandir vich, tainu rabb di thaa te rakhda han🥰🤗
